p: In migratory birds, the frequency of the H5 serotype was found to be the most prevalent (65.9%; 27/41) followed by H9 (56%; 23/41), H1 (41.5%; 17/41), H12 (41.5%; 17/41) and H2 (34.2%; 14/41). In resident wild birds, the distribution of HA serotypes was 66.7% (24/36) H5, 30.6% (11/36) H9 and 25% (9/36) H2. In domestic birds, the HA serotype frequencies were 61.7% for H5 (29/47) and 38.3% for H9 (18/47) in household ducks, 76.3% for H5 (29/38), 55.3% for H2 (21/38) and 36.8% for H9 (14/38) in nomadic ducks, and 71.4% for H5 (5/7) and 28.5% for H9 (2/7) in household chickens ( Table 1).
